title: I’m Interested
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hey, You. Is high diving fun?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Of course! It’s really fun! Are you interested, Ai-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah! Ai has been helping various clubs, but Ai has never done high diving before, so Ai is kind of interested~. It seems really satisfying!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It is~! It feels amazing when you get the technique just right! It’s the best feeling there is~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, but is it hard for beginners to do the spins in the air? Ai thought it would be fun if Ai could do those.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ai-chan, you won’t know if you can or can’t until you try! It’s all a matter of practice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>You’re right....! Please teach me, You!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Leave it to me!! Then, let’s go to the pool right away. If you’re going to do it, let’s go at it hard~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That’s what Ai loves! You-sensei, Ai will be in your care!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Fufu, You-sensei is pretty strict, so make sure you follow along, Ai-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
